text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar ‘We have 15 cases and within a couple of days it will be close to zero’. You have no clue. You didn’t listen to the experts. You thought you knew best. The death of 10,000’s of Americans is on your hands #TrumpVirus #COVID2019US #COVID19
